title: Arkadi Avanesyan
text:
Arkadi Avanesyan is a world-class expert in Finance, Investment Banking, Technology, and Data Science.
Now a global corporate trainer, he teaches modern tools and technologies in finance and data management, with clients including the World Bank and HSBC.


Education
MSc in Quantitative Finance | Solvay Brussels School of Economics and Management
BSc in Business Engineering | Free University of Brussels



Current Projects

Content Creator (Udemy, Starweaver, Coursera)
Software Development Consultant at Longs Peak Advisory Services
Lead Developer at smart payroll
